sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' export default function RegisterForm() { const url="https://localhost:44313/api/Auth/register"; const [data,setData]=useState({ userName: "", password: "", email:"" }) function handle(e) { const newdata={...data} newdata[e.target.id]=e.target.value setData(newdata) console.log(newdata) } function submit(e) { e.preventDefault(); Axios.post(url,{ userName:data.userName, password:data.password, email:data.email }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } return (
submit(e)} className="login-form">
  • handle(e)} value={data.userName} placeholder="Username" className="login-textinput input" />
  • handle(e)} value={data.email} placeholder="Email" className="login-textinput input" />
  • handle(e)} value={data.password} type="password" placeholder="Password" className="login-textinput1 input" />
  • Forgot Password?
) }
